results.title: Florida Flies 2 Planeloads of Migrants to Martha’s Vineyard

results.adx_keywords: Tennis;Federer, Roger
results.title: Roger Federer to Retire From Tennis: ‘He Made the Game Look So Easy’
results.abstract: Federer, who won 20 Grand Slam singles titles, said injuries and surgeries had taken their toll on his body. His final competitive matches will be next week in London.

media.caption: “I want to thank you all from the bottom of my heart, to everyone around the world who has helped make the dreams of a young Swiss ball kid come true,” Federer said.
